Class CustomSurfaceEmittingSphericalSource

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Sources
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements CustomSurfaceEmittingSphericalSource with radius, source profile, polar angle range, azimuthal angle range, direction, position and initial tissue region index.

CustomSurfaceEmittingSphericalSource(double, DoubleRange, DoubleRange, Direction, Position, int)

Returns an instance of Custom Spherical Surface Emitting Source with a user defined surface area (based on polar azimuthal angle range), new source axis direction, and translation,

public CustomSurfaceEmittingSphericalSource(double radius, DoubleRange polarAngleRangeToDefineSphericalSurface, DoubleRange azimuthalAngleRangeToDefineSphericalSurface, Direction newDirectionOfPrincipalSourceAxis = null, Position translationFromOrigin = null, int initialTissueRegionIndex = 0)

Parameters

radius double

The radius of the sphere

polarAngleRangeToDefineSphericalSurface DoubleRange

Polar angle range to define the emitting area of the sphere

Azimuthal angle range to define the emitting area of the sphere
